extensionDescription.message: Shows a notification when the user encrypts their password.

notificationContentSuccess.message: Your password has been succesfully encrypted
notificationContentSuccess.description: Tells the user that their password has been succesfully encrypted.

notificationContentFailedNullValue.message: Encryption failed: for security reasons you cannot encrypt an empty password.
notificationContentFailedNullValue.description: Tells the user that empty values cannot be encrypted.
